text: Hi everyone! I came across so many times where I let the user select the background image for small and large screens but I can’t find a better way of doing it than this. Do you know any other ways of doing this that looks nicer in the code? Thanks in advance!

Hi all, I'm using slick slider in a module to show 3 slides rotating. I've added code for the responsiveness to go down to 2 slides on iPad and 1 on mobile but for some reason it isn't working just keeps shrinking down. I also added "dots: true" in the main code then "dots: false" in the responsive section and it didn't disable them so it is like it isn't seeing what is in the array. I'm not getting any errors in the console either. Any ideas would be appreciated.
Been a while since I’ve used slick, but do you need a unit besides your breakpoints? `991px`?
Going full width that early might look a bit odd but at this point I would just like to see anything work.
Never mind I spelled responsive wrong :rage: I even had a second person look at it.
